| Section8 = {{Chembox Related OtherCpds = Carbon dioxide Carbonyl
| sulfide Carbon diselenide
 }} }} 'Carbon disulfide' is a colorless volatile liquid with the formula
 CS 2. The compound is used frequently as a building block in organic
 chemistry as well as an industrial and chemical non-polar solvent. It has an
 "ether-like" odor, but commercial samples are typically contaminated with foul-
 smelling impurities, such as carbonyl sulfide.
